DOC.brief_summary: This observational study will acquire initial clinical practice utilization and product safety data for the Envision® surface.
DOC.detailed_description: This is a single site, open label, observational study to acquire initial clinical practice utilization information, product safety, and wound healing data, as defined by changes in wound volume and/or surface area, for patients with pressure ulcers placed on this surface.
DOC.criteria: Subject Weight < 400 lbs. Subject has Stage II, III, or IV pressure ulcer on weight bearing aspect of the body Subject estimated length of stay at least 7 days Subject Ability to provide informed consent Inability to provide informed consent
